item.title: BAT 称美国打击非法 Vape 对销售增长至关重要
item.description: 英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）看到了美国打击非法吸食电子烟产品所带来的早期收益，但由于执法工作的时间表存在不确定性，该公司没有提升其指导意见。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc is seeing early benefits from a US crackdown on illicit vaping products, though it stopped short of upgrading its guidance due to uncertainty around the timeline of enforcement efforts.】

item.title: 莫桑比克领导人查波称，道达尔公司应重启液化天然气项目
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔-查波（Daniel Chapo）敦促道达尔能源 SE 恢复其价值 200 亿美元的液化天然气项目，尽管目前正在对该公司的额外成本索赔进行审计。【原文：Mozambican President Daniel Chapo urged TotalEnergies SE to resume its $20 billion LNG project despite an ongoing audit of the company’s additional cost claims, increasing pressure on the French major to restart one of Africa’s biggest energy developments.】

item.title: 阿根廷首富："真正的权力在于选择何时离开
item.description:
MercadoLibre的马科斯-加尔佩林（Marcos Galperin）将交出首席执行官的头衔，但他对公司的业务仍有很多想法。【原文：

MercadoLibre’s Marcos Galperin will hand over the CEO title, but he still has a lot of ideas for the business.

】

item.title: 中国在明年经济路线图中透露出对贸易的不安
item.description: 尽管与美国打响了关税战，但中国仍积累了创纪录的贸易顺差，在制定明年的经济计划时，中国最高领导人表示，他们正警惕全球贸易中可能爆发的紧张局势。【原文：China’s top leaders are signaling they are on alert for a potential flareup of tensions in global commerce as they draw up economic plans for next year, after amassing a record trade surplus despite the tariff war with the US.】

item.title: 特朗普恢复国内旅行，希望平息对经济承受能力的担忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将前往波科诺斯（Poconos），这是他推动国内旅游的首次尝试，目的是消除选民对通货膨胀和经济承受能力的担忧所产生的持续不满情绪。【原文：President Donald Trump is headed to the Poconos for the first foray in a domestic travel push designed to address persistent voter frustration over inflation and affordability concerns.】

item.title: 德国将为箭 3 导弹防御盾建造拦截器
item.description: 据熟悉内情的官员称，柏林与以色列达成的购买箭 3 防空系统的协议包括在德国联合生产拦截导弹。【原文：Berlin’s agreement with Israel to purchase the Arrow 3 air defense system includes joint production of interceptor missiles in Germany, according to officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 希腊农民因拖欠款项继续在全国范围内进行封锁
item.description: 希腊农民周二继续举行全国性抗议活动，暂时封锁了伊拉克利翁机场的跑道，封锁了主要道路，并导致克里特岛最大的岛屿上的部分航班中断。【原文：Greek farmers continued nationwide protests Tuesday blocking key roads and causing some flight disruptions on the largest island of Crete after temporarily blocking the runway at Heraklion Airport.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德与卡塔尔联手打造 200 亿美元人工智能投资项目
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）和卡塔尔投资局（Qatar Investment Authority）正联手投资一家价值 200 亿美元的企业，以投资人工智能基础设施，这凸显出该行业的地区主导权争夺战正在不断升级。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. and Qatar Investment Authority are teaming up on a $20 billion venture to invest in artificial-intelligence infrastructure, underscoring the escalating regional race for dominance in the sector.】

item.title: 尽管存在供应链问题，航空公司仍将在 2026 年获得创纪录的利润
item.description: 顶级游说团体表示，明年全球航空公司的净收入将达到 410 亿美元，乘客数量将达到 52 亿人次，但如果该行业能克服长期存在的供应链问题，净收入将更上一层楼。【原文：Global airlines stand to earn $41 billion in net income next year with 5.2 billion passengers taking to the skies, yet those records would be even higher if the industry overcame persistent supply chain issues, the top lobby group said.】

item.title: 与道达尔公司就纳米比亚石油勘探达成的协议令人失望，Galp 下挫
item.description: Galp Energia SGPS SA 的股价在里斯本下挫达 15%，创下自 2020 年 3 月疫情爆发初期以来的最大跌幅，此前备受关注的纳米比亚油田交易未达预期。【原文：Galp Energia SGPS SA shares sank as much as 15% in Lisbon, the most since the early days of the pandemic in March 2020, after a closely watched oil-field deal in Namibia fell short of expectations.】

item.title: 科技公司抢购商品，台湾进口创下月度纪录
item.description: 台湾的科技公司帮助推动 11 月份的进口创下历史新高，凸显了人工智能热潮对台湾经济的巨大影响。【原文：Taiwan’s tech companies helped push imports to a record in November, underscoring the AI boom’s outsized impact on the archipelago’s economy.】

item.title: 沙特原油供应过剩，中国加大购买沙特廉价原油力度
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将石油价格降至五年来的最低水平后，中国加大了对沙特阿拉伯石油的购买力度，因为全球石油过剩正在增加。【原文：China ramped up buying of Saudi Arabian oil after the kingdom cut prices to the lowest level in five years as a global surplus grows.】

item.title: 美国基金 EJF 准备从地区银行获得两位数收益率的 SRT
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 EJF Capital 的联席首席执行官 Neal Wilson 表示，该公司计划扩大对美国地区银行重大风险转移的投资。【原文：Alternative asset manager EJF Capital plans to expand its investments in significant risk transfers from US regional banks, its co-chief executive officer Neal Wilson said.】

item.title: 特朗普风电禁令被裁定非法后，Orsted 股票上涨
item.description: 在美国联邦法官裁定唐纳德-特朗普总统禁止新建风电项目的行政命令违法后，Orsted A/S 的股价跃升至四个月来的最高水平。【原文：Shares in Orsted A/S jumped to their highest level in four months after a US federal judge ruled President Donald Trump’s executive order banning new wind projects illegal.】

item.title: 谷歌因人工智能工具遭欧盟滥用市场支配地位调查
item.description: 谷歌遭到了欧盟的调查，因为欧盟担心谷歌可能滥用其主导地位，利用自身的人工智能工具挤压竞争对手。【原文：Google has been hit by a European Union investigation over fears it may have abused its dominance by using its own artificial intelligence tools to squeeze out competition.】

item.title: 据说贝恩正在酝酿出售田边制药的非日本资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本正在考虑出售田边制药公司在日本以外的资产。【原文：Bain Capital is considering selling Tanabe Pharma Corp.’s assets outside of Japan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 困境加剧，万科美元债券持有人与顾问接洽
item.description: 中国万科公司的海外债权人已开始要求与潜在顾问进行谈判，这表明投资者正在为该开发商债务危机的恶化做准备。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s offshore creditors have started fielding requests for talks with potential advisors, a sign that investors are preparing for a worsening of the developer’s debt crisis.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯与中国 Momenta 在阿布扎比携手打造机器人轴
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）将与中国软件开发商 Momenta Global Ltd.合作，在阿布扎比为 Lumo Mobility 部署自动驾驶汽车，这标志着这家德国汽车制造商首次涉足机器人轴领域。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG will partner with Chinese software developer Momenta Global Ltd. to deploy self-driving cars for Lumo Mobility in Abu Dhabi, marking the German automaker’s first foray into robotaxis.】

item.title: 南非第四季度消费者信心指数上升
item.description: 南非第四季度的消费者信心指数达到了2025年以来的最高水平，这对即将进入假日季的家庭信心是一个令人鼓舞的信号。【原文：South African consumer sentiment advanced in the fourth quarter to the highest level for 2025, in an encouraging sign for household confidence heading into the holiday season.】

item.title: 顶级足球运动员和前主席在土耳其博彩调查中被捕
item.description: 土耳其逮捕了两名顶级足球联赛球员和一名前超级联赛俱乐部主席，非法博彩调查的范围扩大到了高管和运动员，使这起已经牵涉到裁判的丑闻进一步升级。【原文：Turkey arrested two players from its top football division and a former Super League club chairman as an illegal betting investigation widened to include executives and athletes, escalating a scandal that has already ensnared referees.】

item.title: 印度房地产开发商 RMZ 据称将考虑 10 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度最大的开发商之一 RMZ 公司正在考虑首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 10 亿美元，为该国最大的房地产上市之一铺平道路。【原文：RMZ Corp., one of India’s biggest developers, is considering an initial public offering that may raise as much as $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, paving the way for one of the country’s largest real estate listings.】

item.title: ACC 报告称，去年私人信贷创下部署纪录
item.description: 根据另类信贷委员会（Alternative Credit Council）的一份新报告，去年私人信贷公司部署的资金达到创纪录水平，Ares Management Corp.、阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：The amount of capital that private credit firms have deployed reached a record last year, according to a new report from the Alternative Credit Council, with the larger players like Ares Management Corp., Apollo Global Management Inc. and Blackstone Inc. playing an increasingly dominant role.】

item.title: 即使美国出货量下滑，德国出口仍略有增长
item.description: 德国 10 月份出口略有增长，使人们更加乐观地认为，欧洲最大的经济体正在慢慢摆脱多年来的低迷。【原文：German exports rose slightly in October, adding to optimism that Europe’s largest economy is slowly emerging from a multi-year slump.】

item.title: 印度航空监管机构要求 IndiGo 削减 5%的冬季航班
item.description: 印度航空监管机构命令 IndiGo 在冬季将大容量航线上的航班减少 5%，但不包括其作为唯一运营商的航线，因为该航空公司面临着引发旅行混乱的大面积航班取消所带来的日益严重的后果。【原文：India’s aviation regulator ordered IndiGo to cut flights by 5% on high-capacity routes in winter, though not on those where it’s the only operator, as the airline faces growing fallout from the extensive cancellations that sparked travel chaos.】

item.title: 据说韩国养老金管理局将出售美元以阻止韩元下跌
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，韩国国家养老金管理局最近开始出售美元以支撑韩元，从而重振了此前为支撑韩元所做的努力。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service has recently started selling US dollars to bolster the won, according to a person familiar with the matter, reviving earlier efforts to support the currency.】

item.title: 八达通能源公司预计明年将拥有一百万西班牙客户
item.description: 章鱼能源集团有限公司（Octopus Energy Group Ltd.）预计，到明年下半年，其在西班牙的客户数量将翻一番，中期目标是超过该国的 Naturgy Energy Group SA。【原文：Octopus Energy Group Ltd. expects to roughly double the number of its customers in Spain by the second half of next year, with a medium-term target to leapfrog the country’s Naturgy Energy Group SA.】

item.title: 印度长期利率掉期激增，押注宽松周期结束
item.description: 自印度央行上周召开政策会议以来，印度的长期利率掉期已经跳涨，因为一些投资者押注降息周期已经结束。【原文：India’s longer interest-rate swaps have jumped since the central bank’s policy meeting last week as some investors bet the rate-cut cycle has ended.】

item.title: 英镑上涨，富时 100 指数将保持稳定
载有俄罗斯石油公司石油货物的船只在中国附近海域抛锚
item.description: 俄罗斯石油股份公司（Rosneft PJSC）的一批俄罗斯石油经过漫长而蜿蜒的旅程运抵中国水域，其中包括一次罕见的印度海域油轮转运，以及在韩国附近的短暂停留。【原文：A shipment of Russian oil from US-sanctioned Rosneft PJSC has made its way to Chinese waters after a long, meandering journey that involved a rare tanker transfer off India and a brief stop near South Korea.】

item.title: 欧洲央行再次要求意大利重新考虑黄金储备计划
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）再次要求意大利重新考虑宣布其黄金储备为本国人民财产的问题，批评人士认为此举可能会为政府抛售金银打开大门。【原文：The European Central Bank once again asked Italy to rethink declaring its gold reserves the property of its people, a move critics say could open the door to the government selling off bullion.】
